item.description:
Film and discussion presented by Valley 9/11 Truth
Film begins at 7:00 PM on Wednesday, Noveber 14, 2007
At the Media Education Foundation community room
[Meeting at 6:00 pm and for set-up.]

Northampton--Valley 9/11 Truth is presenting a 45-minute controversial DVD film, called: MASTERS OF THE UNIVERSE: The Secret Birth of the Federal Reserve, November 14th at the Media Education Foundation, 60 Masonic Street, Northampton, MA.

Was there a takeover of the United States by international bankers? A crime so perfect that, for thirty years, no one knew it had even taken place. Join us as we screen and discuss the film investigating the birth of a criminal conspiracy to rob each and every bank vault in the USA, all at the same time in 1913. This is the behind-the-scenes story of the birth of the United States Federal Reserve.

Following the film, Valley 9/11 Truth members will facilitate discussions around the most effective path to expose the corruption and control of the US government to once again serve in the interest of, by, and for the people.

For more resources on the Federal Reserve,
see: http://concernedhuman...

Also the book, SECRETS OF THE FEDERAL RESERVE
By Eustace Mullins - www.whale.to/b/mullins5.html

More resources at www.FlybyNews.com

Contacts:

Valley 9/11 Truth
Website www.valley911truth.org
Jonathan Mark flyby(at)mtdata(dot)com
Rob Laporte rob(at)2disc(dot)com
item.name: Secret Birth Federal Reserve - Film & Discussion
